sentence.Network_en: Halfhearted work will bring no reward, but when we throw our whole soul into the cause, we shall see prosperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有在我们投注所有心力在一个目标上，我们才会看到它开花结果。

sentence.Network_en: A face - saving, halfhearted lunge would follow.
sentence.Network_cn: 随之,就是一阵为省面子的 、 半心半意的突进动作.

list.abs: jejune中文 ... - a jejune diet 缺乏营养的食物; - halfhearted jejune uninteresting 无兴趣的; - jejunea. 空洞的,不成熟的.

entry.def: If someone does something in a half-hearted way, they do it without any real effort, interest, or enthusiasm.

example.ex: Joanna had made one or two half-hearted attempts to befriend Graham's young wife.
example.tran: 乔安娜曾有一两次敷衍着去帮助格雷厄姆年轻的妻子。

means.word_mean: 1. feeling or showing little interest or enthusiasm;

sentences.sentence: "gave only lukewarm support to the candidate"

auth_sentence.content: Clients know a halfhearted attempt when they see one.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clients know a halfhearted attempt when they see one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clients know a halfhearted attempt when they see one.

auth_sentence.content: Then turned to make a barely halfhearted apology.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then turned to make a barely halfhearted apology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then turned to make a barely halfhearted apology.

auth_sentence.content: Once Friedman conceded the bar scene, the restaurant seemed halfhearted.
